Text:
Hey people, this caused my network to not be able to shut down and I had to do a hard power off, with the network continuously running. Now, I am a noob, but I have never experienced this ever, anywhere. So I think it is being TRACKED!
BTW, I have slowed down to a Pentium 3 level of performance from my current dual 3.2 AMD CPU, and it takes more than 10 minutes to boot.
Barrple you're an idiot. Stay off TPB
